s: November 4, 2019 - Instead of three devices, people suddenly had only one! In 1954, the company introduced the first compact AM/FM hi-fi receiver. Two years later, Kardon left the company and Harman became its sole owner. In 1956, Harman/Kardon bought the leading brand audio device – brand JBL.
